column2: an A.M. Eatery////So why only four stars then?  Where's the fifth?  I've tried a couple plates with corned beef hash (Peter Paul Ruben and Classic Corned Beef Plate)
column3: both plates had burnt corned beef.  I love corned beef and I've really wanted to enjoy a plate of it at Snooze because it seems crafty and yummy but eh ...
